# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
Turnkey Laboratory Scale SWIR Hyperspectral Imaging System

## Solicitation Number
WS3734621952

## Date of Public Posting
2022-11-10

## Closing Date for Tenders
2022-11-24T14:00:00 (Note: The closing date has been amended to 29 November 2022 at 14:00 HNE. Only bids received on or before this time will be considered.)

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is available to tenderers who are eligible to participate in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Regions of Delivery
The turnkey laboratory-scale hyperspectral SWIR imaging system is to be delivered to the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.

## Tendering Method
This solicitation is a Request for Proposal, with competitive and open bidding.

## Technical Specifications
The acquisition includes the delivery of one turnkey laboratory-scale hyperspectral SWIR imaging system.

## Supporting Documents and Bid Submission
All required supporting documentation and bid must be submitted at the latest by 14:00 HNE on November 29, 2022. Bids submitted after this time will result in the bidder being declared non-responsive.

## Contractor Contact Information
For more information on this solicitation, please contact Annie Blanchet, SPAC/PSPC, at annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
